google-cloud-foundations.title: Google Cloud Computing Foundations
google-cloud-foundations.description: Earned the foundational certification validating understanding of cloud concepts, big data, and machine learning on Google Cloud.
google-cloud-foundations.quote: Validates ability to articulate the value of Google Cloud and demonstrate hands-on skills.

cttc.title: CTTC Bhubaneswar
cttc.description: Industrial Training certification from Centre for Technology Transfer and Consultancy, Bhubaneswar.

google-cloud-badges.title: Google Cloud Skills Badges
google-cloud-badges.description: Earned multiple specialized skill badges demonstrating practical proficiency in cutting-edge cloud technologies.
google-cloud-badges.quote: Demonstrates commitment to continuous learning in specialized cloud domains.

nptel-llm.title: Introduction to Large Language Models
nptel-llm.description: Specialized certification from IIT Madras focusing on the architecture, training, and deployment of Large Language Models.
nptel-llm.quote: Represents cutting-edge knowledge in the rapidly evolving field of Generative AI.

animate-hackathon.title: ANIMATE 2K24 Winner
animate-hackathon.description: Led the winning team at the online 2D animation hackathon organized by FOSSEE, IIT Bombay.
listItems: Recognized by Director Vidhu Vinod Chopra
animate-hackathon.quote: A testament to creative vision and leadership in digital storytelling.

bug-byte-league.title: Bug Byte League Winner
bug-byte-league.description: Winner of the GGS Hackathon for developing 'MediX Kit', an innovative healthcare solution.
bug-byte-league.quote: Demonstrates the ability to build impactful hardware-software solutions.

nptel-ml.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
nptel-ml.description: Elite Certification from IIT Kharagpur covering fundamental and advanced machine learning algorithms.
nptel-ml.quote: Solid foundation in building and evaluating predictive models.

nptel-python.title: Programming, DS & Algo in Python
nptel-python.description: Elite + Silver Certification from IIT Madras. Mastered core programming, data structures, and algorithms.
nptel-python.quote: Proven excellence in algorithmic problem solving and coding.

nptel-data-analytics.title: Data Analytics with Python
nptel-data-analytics.description: Certification from IIT Roorkee focusing on data analysis techniques, visualization, and statistical interpretation.
nptel-data-analytics.quote: Validates the ability to derive actionable insights from raw data.

nptel-graphic-design.title: Introduction to Graphic Design
nptel-graphic-design.description: Elite Certification from IIT Hyderabad exploring visual design principles and digital creativity.
nptel-graphic-design.quote: Bridges the gap between technical functionality and aesthetic user experience.

nptel-soft-skills.title: Enhancing Soft Skills & Personality
nptel-soft-skills.description: Elite Certification from IIT Kanpur focused on interpersonal communication and professional etiquette.
nptel-soft-skills.quote: Essential training for effective communication and team collaboration.

nptel-ethics.title: Ethics in Engineering Practice
nptel-ethics.description: Elite Certification from IIT Kharagpur on moral and ethical dilemmas in engineering.
nptel-ethics.quote: Ensures a responsible and principled approach to engineering solutions.
